      • applyProgress

        public void applyProgress(int progress,
                          boolean animate)

        Sets the current progress to the specified value. Does not do anything if the progress is not in range 0..maxProgress.

        This method will immediately update the visual position of the progress indicator. To animate the visual position to the target value, use animate.

        Parameters:
        progress - the new progress, between 0 and maxProgress
        animate - true to animate between the current and target values or false to not animate
        See Also:
        animate

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(@NotNull
                    android.graphics.Bitmap iconBitmap)

        Set the left icon bitmap.

        Parameters:
        iconBitmap - set the left icon.

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix(@NotNull
                      java.lang.String prefix)

        Set the prefix text to the progress bar view.

        Parameters:
        prefix - set the prefix text.
